channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- .NET Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- .NET Core

item.title: CVE-2018-0875|2024-08-05T03:44:11.381Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- .net%20core
item.description: .NET Core 1.0, .NET Core 1.1, NET Core 2.0 and PowerShell Core 6.0.0 allow a denial of Service vulnerability due to how specially crafted requests are handled, aka ".NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability".
